name: Adverttu
slogan: Get your brand on the road
description:
Adverttu provides a new outdoor advertising solution.

We connect UK-based SMEs that are looking to advertise with private motorists, wishing to benefit financially via renting commercial space on the side of their car.

Our clients have access to a bespoke online platform that gives them easy access to their very own marketing campaign. They are able to monitor, assess and extend an existing campaign.

Measurement of each campaign is facilitated with the help of mobile app and cutting-edge analytics tool based on AI principles & real-time data provided by ONS, Waze, and ArcGIS.

Our solution helps:
•Companies - to increase awareness;
•Drivers - earn passive income;
•Suppliers (wrapping companies) - increase their revenue flow and maintain momentum.

Adverttu' ambition is to become a major advertising medium by creating an autonomous platform for outdoor advertising, without owning any media assets.

jobs.title: Agency Sales/Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Company Overview:

Adverttu is a recently VC-backed decentralised car-advertisement solution provider. The company aim is to act as an online platform between organisations, daily car drivers & wrap suppliers.

Our start-up enables companies and organisations to raise brand awareness on local and regional levels, while at the same time providing an income stream for private car owners & a solid client base for local wrapping companies.

Adverttu utilises motorist’s vehicles to bring companies’ message to a local community in a coherent and eye-catching way.

Adverttu' ambition is to become a major advertising medium by creating an autonomous platform for outdoor advertising without owning any media assets.



Job Description:

Adverttu is looking to recruit additional innovative commercial talent to join the existing team (around 2-5 years relevant advertising or related technology inside sales experience) who can evangelize the huge opportunity for advertisers in the emerging on-car advertising medium. You will need to have the following attributes:


· Passionate with a demonstrable deal closure track record

· A good understanding of the ad agency/brand sector with some knowledge of OOH & Digital

· A strategic & creative approach to Sales

· Engaging written & verbal presentation skills

· Common sense/adaptability/determination and ambition

· A results-oriented mindset


On-car advertising is a new frontier – so were looking for people who want to influence this emerging ad landscape of opportunity, handling defined FMCG & Retail client & agency sectors and own them!



Responsibilities:

• Creative yet process-driven sales approach 

• Selling the medium and the value proposition 

• Key account handling skills

• CRM reporting & Proposal writing

• Managing agency & client relationships

• Liaison with third party Lead gen Service Provider

• Suspect to prospect profiling skills

 

Desired Skills & Experience:

• Demonstrable consultative sales experience in ad or tech sales

• Outstanding presentation skills

• Proven track record

• Undergraduate degree preferred but not mandatory

 

Job Perks:

• Become one of the company’s founding employees from the ground up 

• Uncapped commission with £55K+ OTE

• Receive EMI options as you hit your milestones

• Potential for relocation (upon desire & request) as we grow

• Office snacks, drinks, beers & days out;

• An excellent reference on your CV

 

If you believe you can hit the road running from day one please send us your resume with a covering letter that will entice us to interview you!

jobs.title: Analyst Intern - Business Development Operations
jobs.description:
Description:
Adverttu is seeking a commercially oriented tech-savvy Operations Analytics support intern who is probably doing an engineering/operations degree, wishes to get some first hand startup experience in the ad-tech sector, who can hit the ground running to aid the commercialisation of Adverttu’s on-car advertising Platform that is set to disrupt the OOH media sector by bringing online effectiveness measurement techniques and planning flexibilities to the traditional OOH media sector.

On-car advertising is set to become a vibrant emerging media channel that leverages the GIG economy by providing passive income to drivers whose journey profiles deliver dynamic media exposure to advertisers through creative, eye-catching ‘vehicle wrap’ creative.

We have just raised significant VC Seed funding for our first expansion phase in the UK and to aid our global domination ambitions, we need you! The role includes internal liaison with the commercial team and their interaction with our internationally located product design and technical teams and will also include project management of some of our internal operations, liaison with sales personnel, and driver support role.

Must haves:'
• Passion
• Work ethic and confidence
• IT multi skills
• Buckets of Smartness with evidence of good research skills
• Bachelor in Engineering and/or Masters in Operations

Nice to haves:'
• Sense of humour
• Business acumen
• Good communication skills
• Nice manners and a can-do mindset!

Benefits:
• Being part of a revolutionary car-advertising platform
• Freedom to take the initiative and play a key role in the company's growth
• Develop client relationship and interpersonal skills
• Cake Mondays & Beer Fridays
• Dog-friendly office (We love them!)
• Truly valuable work/life experience that could become a career!

Additionally, you will gain experience and mentoring in a wide range of disciplines within business development, marketing, PR, analytics and project management in a fast-growing startup that aims to become the dominant International mobility media enabler that will License its technology stack into major International markets & territories within the next 12 months.

To qualify for an initial phone interview please send an amusing email extolling your values, virtues and goodness! No calls or agencies, please!

jobs.title: Head of Growth
jobs.description:
Company Overview:

Adverttu is a recently VC-backed decentralised car-advertisement solution provider. The company aim is to act as an online platform between organisations, daily car drivers & wrap suppliers.

Our start-up enables companies and organisations to raise brand awareness on local and regional levels, while at the same time providing an income stream for private car owners & a solid client base for local wrapping companies.

We move at a high speed, and will provide you with immense opportunities for initiative, creativity and leadership. Our proudly diverse, international team is based in London, Paris and San Diego, and has a wealth of experience from mobility to computer vision and AI.

Adverttu' ambition is to become a major advertising medium by creating an autonomous platform for outdoor advertising without owning any media assets, and we're looking for a person who would accompany us on that journey.
 

Job Description:

Adverttu is looking to recruit a Head of Growth to join the existing team, and who will be responsible for growing Adverttu's bottom line by working at the intersection of sales, product and marketing. An ideal candidate is a strategic leader who would be able to balance big-picture thinking with hands-on execution based on rapid experimentation. You will come up with a digital strategy, acquire strategic affiliate partnerships and then test those against our user interests and iterate fast to unlock revenue growth.

• Minimum 3 years in growth or marketing roles at a hyper-growth company

• Proven track record of driving digital growth and exceeding revenue goals

• Highly analytical, and able to experiment and scale rapidly

• Deep experience of Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Facebook Ads and other digital marketing platforms—sometimes you find yourself dreaming about CPA, CTR and data-driven attribution


Responsibilities:

• Growth: Drive driver acquisition in the UK along with our Ad-spend team

• Leadership: Recruit, lead and mentor a cross-functional team to build and execute growth strategies

• Marketing: Build multi-channel marketing campaigns together with your team to drive brand sentiment and user growth

• Partnerships: Identify and negotiate key partnerships to drive growth and revenue

• Business Analysis: Monitor and assess the performance of your deals

• Work with and support central product teams to improve tools to drive growth in the market

• Ensure alignment within other commercial teams for other revenue-generating initiatives

 
Job Perks:

• You'll get to join a passionate startup with proven traction on its scaling journey

• Friendly, open and transparent culture

• £30-40K PA + Quarterly performance bonuses

• Receive EMI options as you hit your milestones

• Access to a company vehicle (Tesla Model 3 / BMW 330e G20)

• Awesome startup office in Central London, London Bridge

• Potential for relocation (upon desire & request) as we grow

• Office snacks, drinks, beers & days out
 

If you believe you can hit the road running from day one please send us your resume with a covering letter that will entice us to interview you!

jobs.title: Operations Project Manager
jobs.description:
Company Overview:

Adverttu is a recently VC-backed decentralised car-advertisement solution provider. The company aim is to act as an online platform between organisations, daily car drivers & wrap suppliers.

Our start-up enables companies and organisations to raise brand awareness on local and regional levels, while at the same time providing an income stream for private car owners & a solid client base for local wrapping companies.

We move at a high speed, and will provide you with immense opportunities for initiative, creativity and leadership. Our proudly diverse, international team is based in London, Paris and San Diego, and has a wealth of experience from mobility to computer vision and AI.

Adverttu' ambition is to become a major advertising medium by creating an autonomous platform for outdoor advertising without owning any media assets, and we're looking for a person who would accompany us on that journey.
 


Job Description:

Adverttu is looking to recruit an Operations Project Manager (3-5 years relevant operations or related technology experience) to join the existing team, and who knows their way around the implementation phase of a new project. A deep understanding of our company software, and the ability to understand the client's needs and somehow weave them together. The challenge is to manage the clients, the resources and the implementation team, and to run the project for the duration, adapting to changing business scenarios and managing risks and budgets. The ideal candidate should have the following:

• Previous experience in Logistics and Operations

• Data-driven decision-making mentality, sound business judgment, and the ability to think outside the box

• Ability to take initiative in a constantly changing work environment

• Experience creating and optimising processes

• Excellent understanding of a variety of business models (we're still proving ours)

On-car advertising is a new frontier – so were looking for person who can not only maintain day-to-day operations, but being able to work with our development & product team to continuously improve the internal processes.



Responsibilities:

• Execute advertising campaigns by locating & connecting drivers to relevant wrapping facilities

• Manage the influx of orders from the advertisers & coordinate the execution of advertising campaigns

• Negotiate and close contracts with commercial fleet owners to fill in the inventory gaps for the upcoming campaigns

• Strategically schedule & route drivers/commercial fleets to optimise campaign cost

• Build out our supply chain between drivers/fleets and wrapping facilities alongside our development & product teams

 

Job Perks:

• You'll get to join a passionate startup with proven traction on its scaling journey

• Friendly, open and transparent culture

• £35-40K PA + Quarterly performance bonuses

• Receive EMI options as you hit your milestones

• Access to a company vehicle (Tesla Model 3 / BMW 330e G20)

• Awesome startup office in Central London, Borough

• Potential for relocation (upon desire & request) as we grow

• Office snacks, drinks, beers & days out
 

If you believe you can hit the road running from day one please send us your resume with a covering letter that will entice us to interview you!

• Appreciate and have an eye for good design

Company Overview:

Adverttu is a recently VC-backed decentralised car-advertisement solution provider. The company aim is to act as an online platform between organisations, daily car drivers & wrap suppliers.

Our start-up enables companies and organisations to raise brand awareness on local and regional levels, while at the same time providing an income stream for private car owners & a solid client base for local wrapping companies.

Adverttu utilises motorist’s vehicles to bring companies’ message to a local community in a coherent and eye-catching way.

Adverttu' ambition is to become a major advertising medium by creating an autonomous platform for outdoor advertising without owning any media assets.

Job Description:

Adverttu is looking to recruit a creative UI and UX Designer to join our product team and help us create innovative and user-centric experiences in a fast-paced, agile startup environment. You will need to have the following attributes:

• Always be on top of your game!

• Appreciate and have an eye for good design

• Be familiar and have experience with iterative design

• Great problem-solving skills

• Have a very good understanding of the Human-Centric and Interaction Design principles and workflow

• Have a top-notch experience with industry-standard tools

• Be Up-to-date with the latest trends and methodologies

• Have a good portfolio showcasing previous projects

• Last but not least: be friendly, full of energy and have a positive attitude!

Responsibilities:

• Conduct User Research and gather user data through various channels (E.g. User Interview, Surveys, Analytics tools)

• Create User Personas and Journey Maps based on the research data

• Providing wireframes and prototypes for different user scenarios in an iterative fashion

• Be able to run UX Tests using different testing methods (E.g. A/B Testing, Usability Testing, Beta Testing, Surveys)

• Produce clean, sleek, and trendy hand-off deliverables

• Find solutions for current problems or create new experiences from scratch

Desired Skills & Experience:

• Previous Experience with Startups and/or working in a fast-paced environment

• Proficiency in industry-standard tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, InVision Studio, Slack, Miro/Mural, Analytics Tools (E.g. Mixpanel, Firebase, Google Analytics), etc…

• Great communication skills

• Knowledge of HTML/CSS/JS is a plus

• Undergraduate design degree preferred but not mandatory

Job Perks:

• Become one of the company’s founding employees from the ground up

• £30K PA + Quarterly performance bonuses

• Receive EMI options as you hit your milestones

• Potential for relocation (upon desire & request) as we grow

• Office snacks, drinks, beers & days out;

• An excellent reference on your CV

If you believe you can hit the road running from day one please send us your resume with a covering letter that will entice us to interview you!
